project.description: 1. triggered manually - inputs: 1. TAGof TP/GWAPP or Gerrit change 2. The TAG name or the Gerrit commit ID, use: "copy full SHA to clipboard" 3. Customer (optional) 2. download HostedTP_CENTOS8 of this tag or this Gerrit change 3. use private labeling if customer != empty 4. compile and deploy to artifactory

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Build_ISO_From
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Do you wish to build ISO from an existing Tag? or from an open gerrit change?

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Tag_Or_GerritChange_Value
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If you build ISO from a Tag then insert the desired tag If from an open gerrit change then insert here the commit ID (sha1) - you can copy from the gerrit change web page - there is a button of "copy full SHA to clipboard"

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Customer
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This param should be filled only for a private label ISO. Search the customer name on the following path: https://artifactory/sbc-release/com/ac/sbc/ISO/private-labels If exist, all files under this customer folder will be copied from artifactory to compilation workspace before compilation (should changed the icon image etc...)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
BL=`git describe --tags --first-parent | sed s/-/_/g` echo BL ver is: ${BL} # Use NEWTAG as the name in the Artifactory - add $Customer in case it is exist
Tag=${Tag_Or_GerritChange_Value} if [ "$Build_ISO_From" != "TAG" ]; then Tag=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=1); fi if [ "$Customer" != "" ]; then NEWTAG=${Tag}-$Customer; else NEWTAG=$Tag; fi
echo NEWTAG=${NEWTAG} > generated_version.properties echo GERRIT_BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` >> generated_version.properties

if [ "$Build_ISO_From" == "TAG" ]; then rev=$(git rev-parse --verify $Tag_Or_GerritChange_Value^{commit}) ArtifactoryRepo="sbc-release" #rev=$(git rev-parse HEAD) else rev=${Tag_Or_GerritChange_Value} ArtifactoryRepo="sbc-review" fi
#Bring 'HostedTP_CENTOS8' the needed cmp for this compilation User="admin:$artifactory_password" uri=$(curl -ks -u $User "https://artifactory/api/search/prop?vcs.revision=$rev&repos=$ArtifactoryRepo" | grep uri | \ cut -d'"' -f4 | grep HostedTP_CENTOS8 | grep -v LAB | grep .cmp | head -1) if [ "$uri" == "" ]; then echo Need waiting to HostedTP CENTOS8 compilation... if [ "$NAGINATOR_COUNT" == 3 ]; then echo " *************** Exit, no HostedTP was found ************************** " exit 1 else echo " *************** Try again, HostedTP is not ready ************************** " exit 2 fi fi
downloadUri=$(curl -ks -u $User $uri | grep "downloadUri" | cut -d'"' -f4)
# Bring the Centos8-ISO repository - you must it to build the ISO commit_sha1=`git ls-files --stage OpenSource/Centos8-ISO | cut -f2 -d ' '` cd .. if [ ! -e Centos8-ISO/.git ]; then git -c http.sslverify=false clone -n https://test-gerrit/TP/OpenSource/Centos8-ISO OpenSource/Centos8-ISO fi
cd OpenSource/Centos8-ISO git checkout -f $commit_sha1 sudo chmod -R 755 . sudo chown -R centos:centos .
#Copy HostedTP_SIP_CENTOS8.cmp to centos8/isofiles/sbc.install rm -f centos8/isofiles/sbc.install curl -ks -u $User $downloadUri --output centos8/isofiles/sbc.install cp centos8/isofiles/sbc.install ./
ls -l centos8/isofiles
# should we use private labeling in this ISO ? echo "Check if need to change files for a specific customer" if [[ $Customer != "" ]]; then
cd ../.. echo "******* START PRIVATE LABALING ************" PRIVATE=https://artifactory/api/storage/sbc-release/com/ac/sbc/ISO/private-labels DOWNLOAD=$(echo $PRIVATE | sed 's|api/storage/||') echo "download from artifactory all files under $Customer" for f in $(curl -ks -u $User "$PRIVATE/$Customer" | grep -B1 false | grep uri | cut -d'"' -f4); do if [ ! -d $Customer ]; then mkdir $Customer; fi curl -ks -u $User -X GET "${DOWNLOAD}/${Customer}$f" --output ${Customer}$f; done echo Download copyFiles_master.sh curl -ks -u $User -X GET "${DOWNLOAD}/copyFiles_master.sh" --output copyFiles_master.sh echo "Check if copyFiles_master.sh exist" if [[ -f ./copyFiles_master.sh && -d $Customer ]]; then # Dos2unix tr -d '\r' < copyFiles_master.sh > copyFiles_unix.sh chmod +x copyFiles_unix.sh # The two following new variables are needed for the copyFiles_master.sh script CENTOS_VERSION=8 LABEL_SRC=$Customer source ./copyFiles_unix.sh cat copyFiles_unix.sh echo "$Customer files were copied to the right path" echo "******* END PRIVATE LABALING ***********" cd OpenSource/Centos8-ISO else echo "The file copyFiles_master.sh is missing or the $Customer directory was not created, no files were copied" exit 1 fi else echo "No private labaling is needed in this ISO" echo "Continuing to build" fi
./build_centos8_iso.sh
ls -l
imageFile=sbc8.iso if [ ! -f $imageFile ] || [ "`du $imageFile | cut -f1`" -lt 900000 ]; then echo "$imageFile Image too small.. exit with error" exit -1 fi
mv $imageFile $WORKSPACE/sbc-c8-F$NEWTAG.iso
echo Deploy to Artifactory curl -ks -u $User -X PUT "https://artifactory/$ArtifactoryRepo/com/ac/sbc/ISO/Centos8/${GERRIT_BRANCH}/${NEWTAG}/sbc-c8-F$NEWTAG.iso" \ -T $WORKSPACE/sbc-c8-F$NEWTAG.iso curl -ks -u $User -X PUT "https://artifactory/$ArtifactoryRepo/com/ac/sbc/ISO/Centos8/${GERRIT_BRANCH}/${NEWTAG}/copyFiles.sh" \ -T $WORKSPACE/copyFiles.sh
